nodes.text: Obatt was a Duros male lieutenant who served the Galactic Republic during the Cold War. In the year 3643 BBY, he tasked a Republic hero to protect a House Organa field operative while he dismantled a Ulgo sensor in the area. The mission was successful, and the hero returned to Obatt.
Obatt appears in the mission "Special Delivery" for Republic classes in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as the mission starting point and endpoint.
